thread.title: Boiler Room Holding T2 Trainspotting Rave
thread.title_full: Boiler Room Holding T2 Trainspotting Rave

author: Sheldon Pearce
title: Boiler Room Holding T2 Trainspotting Rave
text:
Boiler Room Holding T2 Trainspotting Rave Featuring throwback sets from Goldie and Sasha Photo by Eamonn M. McCormack/Getty Images for Sony Pictures 
For the upcoming launch of T2 Trainspotting at the Berlin Film Festival, Boiler Room is hosting a rave that will channel the club scenes in the iconic first film. The event takes place this Friday in Berlin. Itâ€™s the first time Boiler Room has partnered with a film. Sasha and Goldie will both play exclusive throwback sets for the rave. Modeselektor and Head High will also perform. Find out more information about the rave here . T2 Trainspotting is out in the United States beginning March 17 and features returning cast members Ewan McGregor and Ewen Bremner.
